law.catch_line: Premium reductions for motor vehicles equipped with antitheft device.
law.text: For motor vehicle insurance rates, whether in a competitive market or a noncompetitive market, appropriate reductions in premium charges for comprehensive coverage shall be applied to those motor vehicles equipped with an antitheft device as provided in KRS 304.20-410 to 304.20-440 which has been approved by the commissioner.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1122, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 352, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1986.
